Symbol.Script_3D:
! 0.25-2.5 LPS Water Softener
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat operatorMaterial = sMat ENDIF MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial
PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
DEFINE MATERIAL "Shaft Black Plastic" 20, 0.147059, 0.135294, 0.103922, 0.9, 0.6, 0.2, 0, 10, 0, 1, 0.978103, 0.968383, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0
! --- WATER SOFTENER --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2,0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT -mineralTankDiam/2, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, mineralTankDiam/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -mineralTankDiam/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT A - mineralTankDiam / 2, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2, brineTankDiam/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2, -brineTankDiam/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2,0, brineTankHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT -mineralTankDiam/2, 0, mineralTankHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT A - mineralTankDiam / 2, 0, brineTankHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2, brineTankDiam/2, brineTankHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2, -brineTankDiam/2, brineTankHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN ! Detailed
ROTy -90 MATERIAL "Shaft Black Plastic" IF useSysMat THEN MATERIAL sMat
REVOLVE 2, 360, 1+16+32, 0, mineralTankDiam/2 + 0.003, 2, 0.2 * mineralTankHeight, mineralTankDiam/2 + 0.003, 1
MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial
IF mineralTankHeight - mineralTankDiam/2 > 0.0003+EPS THEN REVOLVE 3, 360, 1+2+16+32, 0.003, mineralTankDiam/2, 2, mineralTankHeight - mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankDiam/2, 1, mineralTankHeight, actD/2, 1002 ELSE REVOLVE 3, 360, 1+2+16+32, 0.003, mineralTankDiam/2, 1, 1, 0, 801, mineralTankHeight, actD/2, 1002 ENDIF DEL 1
ADDx A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2
ROTy -90 TOLER 0.01 REVOLVE 5, 360, 1+2+16+32, 0, 0.9*brineTankDiam/2, 2, 0.02, 0.9*brineTankDiam/2, 2, 0.02, brineTankDiam/2, 2, brineTankHeight - dR, brineTankDiam/2, 1, brineTankHeight, brineTankDiam/2 - dR, 1002 DEL 2
MATERIAL operatorMaterial
TOLER 0.05 ADDz mineralTankHeight CYLIND 0.01, actD/2 ADDz 0.01 ROTx 90 ADDz -valveDepth/2 PRISM_ 9, valveDepth, -valveWidth/2, dR, 79, -valveWidth/2, valveHeight-dR, 79, -valveWidth/2+dR, valveHeight, 1079, valveWidth/2-dR, valveHeight, 79, valveWidth/2, valveHeight-dR, 1079, valveWidth/2, dR, 79, valveWidth/2-dR, 0, 1079, -valveWidth/2+dR, 0, 79, -valveWidth/2, dR, 1079
DEL 4
MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial
R = 0.02 pR = ConWidth_3/2 hX2 = (A - mineralTankDiam - brineTankDiam) / 2 hX1 = hX2 + (mineralTankDiam - valveWidth) / 2 cL = mineralTankHeight - brineTankHeight + valveHeight
ADD valveWidth/2, 0, ZZYZX - valveHeight/2 REVOLVE 2, 360, 1+2, 0, pR, 1, hX1 - R, pR, 1
ROTy 90 ROTz 90 ADD 0, -R, hX1 - R REVOLVE 2, 90, 1+2, 0, R, 901, pR, 360, 4001
ROTz -90 ADDz R REVOLVE 2, 360, 1+2, 0, pR, 1, cL, pR, 1
ADDx cL ROTy 90 ROTz -90 ADDy -R REVOLVE 2, 90, 1+2, 0, R, 901, pR, 360, 4001
ADDz R ROTz -90 REVOLVE 2, 360, 1+2, 0, pR, 1, hX2-R, pR, 1 DEL 12 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN ! Simple ROTy -90 IF mineralTankHeight - mineralTankDiam/2 > 0.0003+EPS THEN REVOLVE 3, 360, 1+2+16+32, 0, mineralTankDiam/2, 2, mineralTankHeight - mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankDiam/2, 1, mineralTankHeight, actD/2, 1002 ELSE REVOLVE 3, 360, 1+2+16+32, 0.003, mineralTankDiam/2, 1, 1, 0, 801, mineralTankHeight, actD/2, 1002 ENDIF DEL 1
ADDx A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2 PRISM_ 2, brineTankHeight, 0,0, 979, brineTankDiam/2,360,4079 DEL 1
MATERIAL operatorMaterial
ADDz mineralTankHeight + 0.01 ROTx 90 ADDz -valveDepth/2 PRISM 4, valveDepth, -valveWidth/2, -0.01, -valveWidth/2, valveHeight, valveWidth/2, valveHeight, valveWidth/2, -0.01 DEL 3
MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial
R = 0.02 pR = ConWidth_3/2 hX2 = (A - mineralTankDiam - brineTankDiam) / 2 hX1 = hX2 + (mineralTankDiam - valveWidth) / 2 cL = mineralTankHeight - brineTankHeight + valveHeight
ADD valveWidth/2, 0, ZZYZX - valveHeight/2 REVOLVE 2, 360, 1+2, 0, pR, 1, hX1 - R, pR, 1
ROTy 90 ROTz 90 ADD 0, -R, hX1 - R REVOLVE 2, 90, 1+2, 0, R, 901, pR, 360, 4001
ROTz -90 ADDz R REVOLVE 2, 360, 1+2, 0, pR, 1, cL, pR, 1
ADDx cL ROTy 90 ROTz -90 ADDy -R REVOLVE 2, 90, 1+2, 0, R, 901, pR, 360, 4001
ADDz R ROTz -90 REVOLVE 2, 360, 1+2, 0, pR, 1, hX2-R, pR, 1 DEL 12 ENDIF
DEL TOP RESOL res
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 12, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 12, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 14, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 14 END
Symbol.Script_2D:
! 0.25-2.5 LPS Water Softener
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- WATER SOFTENER --- !
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2,0, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 -mineralTankDiam/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, mineralTankDiam/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -mineralTankDiam/2, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 A - mineralTankDiam / 2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2, brineTankDiam/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2, -brineTankDiam/2, unID: unID=unID+1
IF GLOB_CONTEXT <> 22 THEN POLY2_B 2, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 901, mineralTankDiam/2,360,4001
ADD2 A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2, 0 POLY2_B 2, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 901, brineTankDiam/2,360,4001 DEL 1
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -valveWidth/2,-valveDepth/2, 1, -valveWidth/2, valveDepth/2, 1, valveWidth/2, valveDepth/2, 1, valveWidth/2,-valveDepth/2, 1
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, valveWidth/2, ConWidth_3/2, 1, A - mineralTankDiam/2 - brineTankDiam, ConWidth_3/2, 1, A - mineralTankDiam/2 - brineTankDiam, -ConWidth_3/2, 1, valveWidth/2, -ConWidth_3/2, 1
ENDIF ENDIF DEL TOP
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
ROT2 (SYMB_MIRRORED - NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED)) * (DrawingNum > 1) * SYMB_ROTANGLE
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * SYMB_MIRRORED, 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 2, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 2, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 1, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 1 DEL 1
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
! 0.25-2.5 LPS Water Softener
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
valveDepth = valveWidth / 2 valveHeight = ZZYZX - mineralTankHeight - 0.01 actD = 0.2 * mineralTankDiam ! Timer and Valve neck height
dR = 0.02 ! Actuators rounding
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! 0.25-2.5 LPS Water Softener
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_str[2][2] ui_vis_str[1][1] = `Корпус` ui_vis_str[2][1] = `Панель Управления` ui_vis_str[1][2] = "MainBoxMaterial" ui_vis_str[2][2] = "operatorMaterial"
DIM ui_vis_attr[5][4] FOR i = 1 TO 5 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 3 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 0 ui_vis_attr[1][4] = 0
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[4] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0 ui_con_type[3] = 0 ui_con_type[4] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_str = ui_vis_str, ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! 0.25-2.5 LPS Water Softener
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minW = brineTankDiam + mineralTankDiam + 0.05 IF A<minW THEN A=minW PARAMETERS A=minW ENDIF VALUES "A" RANGE [minW,]
!! minD = 0.20 !! VALUES "B" RANGE [minD,] !! IF B<minD THEN !! B=minD !! PARAMETERS B=minD !! ENDIF !! VALUES "B" RANGE [minD,]
minH = 0.30 IF ZZYZX<minH THEN ZZYZX=minH PARAMETERS ZZYZX=minH ENDIF VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [minH,]
minV = 0.05 maxV = MAX(3*minV, A-brineTankDiam) VALUES "mineralTankDiam" RANGE[minV, maxV] IF mineralTankDiam<minV THEN mineralTankDiam=minV PARAMETERS mineralTankDiam=minV ENDIF IF mineralTankDiam>maxV THEN mineralTankDiam=maxV PARAMETERS mineralTankDiam=maxV ENDIF
minV = 0.1 maxV = ZZYZX-0.15 VALUES "mineralTankHeight" RANGE[minV, maxV] IF mineralTankHeight<minV THEN mineralTankHeight=minV PARAMETERS mineralTankHeight=minV ENDIF IF mineralTankHeight>maxV THEN mineralTankHeight=maxV PARAMETERS mineralTankHeight=maxV ENDIF
minV = 0.05 maxV = MAX(3*minV, A-mineralTankDiam) VALUES "brineTankDiam" RANGE[minV, maxV] IF brineTankDiam<minV THEN brineTankDiam=minV PARAMETERS brineTankDiam=minV ENDIF IF brineTankDiam>maxV THEN brineTankDiam=maxV PARAMETERS brineTankDiam=maxV ENDIF
minV = 0.1 maxV = ZZYZX-0.15 VALUES "brineTankHeight" RANGE[minV, maxV] IF brineTankHeight<minV THEN brineTankHeight=minV PARAMETERS brineTankHeight=minV ENDIF IF brineTankHeight>maxV THEN brineTankHeight=maxV PARAMETERS brineTankHeight=maxV ENDIF
minV = 0.05 maxV = mineralTankDiam VALUES "valveWidth" RANGE[minV, maxV] IF valveWidth<minV THEN valveWidth=minV PARAMETERS valveWidth=minV ENDIF IF valveWidth>maxV THEN valveWidth=maxV PARAMETERS valveWidth=maxV ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ZZYZX" THEN mineralTankHeight = ZZYZX - valveHeight - 0.01 PARAMETERS mineralTankHeight = mineralTankHeight ENDIF
IF brineTankHeight > mineralTankHeight THEN brineTankHeight = mineralTankHeight PARAMETERS brineTankHeight = mineralTankHeight ENDIF
B = MAX(brineTankDiam, mineralTankDiam) PARAMETERS B = B LOCK "B" ENDIF
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN valveDepth = valveWidth/2 valveHeight = ZZYZX - mineralTankHeight - 0.01 actD = 0.2 * mineralTankDiam ! Timer and Valve neck height
minX = -valveWidth/2+ConWidth_1/2+dR maxX = valveWidth/2-ConWidth_1/2-dR VALUES "ConPosX_1" RANGE[minX, maxX] IF ConPosX_1<minX THEN ConPosX_1=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_1=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_1>maxX THEN ConPosX_1=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_1=maxX ENDIF PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = ZZYZX LOCK "ConPosY_1", "ConPosZ_1"
minX = -valveWidth/2+ConWidth_2/2+dR maxX = valveWidth/2-ConWidth_2/2-dR VALUES "ConPosX_2" RANGE[-valveWidth/2+dR, valveWidth/2-dR] IF ConPosX_2<minX THEN ConPosX_2=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_2=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_2>maxX THEN ConPosX_2=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_2=maxX ENDIF PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ZZYZX LOCK "ConPosY_2", "ConPosZ_2"
PARAMETERS ConPosX_3 = -valveWidth/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = 0 minZ = mineralTankHeight+actD+ConWidth_3/2+dR maxZ = ZZYZX-ConWidth_3/2-dR VALUES "ConPosZ_3" RANGE[minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosZ_3<minZ THEN ConPosZ_3=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_3>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_3=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3=maxZ ENDIF LOCK "ConPosX_3", "ConPosY_3"
PARAMETERS ConPosX_4 = A - (mineralTankDiam + brineTankDiam) / 2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_4 = -brineTankDiam/2 minZ = ConWidth_4/2 maxZ = brineTankHeight-ConWidth_4/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_4" RANGE[minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosZ_4<minZ THEN ConPosZ_4=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_4>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_4=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4=maxZ ENDIF LOCK "ConPosX_4", "ConPosY_4" ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 4
! --- WATER SUPPLY (HARD) CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Мягкая Вода`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(actD, valveWidth) / 2
VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_1<EPS THEN ConWidth_1=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_1>maxCW THEN ConWidth_1=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=maxCW ENDIF
VALUES "ConWallThickness_1" RANGE [0, ConWidth_1/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- WATER (SOFT) CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Жёсткая Вода`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(actD, valveWidth) / 2
VALUES "ConLength_2" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_2<EPS THEN ConWidth_2=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_2>maxCW THEN ConWidth_2=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=maxCW ENDIF
VALUES "ConWallThickness_2" RANGE [0, ConWidth_2/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- DRAIN CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Дренаж 1`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = 1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(actD, valveWidth) / 2
VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_3" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_3<EPS THEN ConWidth_3=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_3>maxCW THEN ConWidth_3=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=maxCW ENDIF
VALUES "ConWallThickness_3" RANGE [0, ConWidth_3/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 4 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Дренаж 2`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = -1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(brineTankDiam) / 3
VALUES "ConLength_4" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_4" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_4" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_4<EPS THEN ConWidth_4=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_4=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_4>maxCW THEN ConWidth_4=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_4=maxCW ENDIF
VALUES "ConWallThickness_4" RANGE [0, ConWidth_4/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_4, ConPosY = ConPosY_4, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_4, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_4, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_4, ConWidth = ConWidth_4, ConDepth = ConDepth_4, ConLength = ConLength_4, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_4, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_4, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_4, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_4, ConToolType = ConToolType_4, ConStatus = ConStatus_4, ConType_4 = ConType_4, ConConnectorType_4 = ConConnectorType_4, ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_4, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_4, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
